mapper.insert: insert into tb_activity_range (activity_id, goods_id, create_time, status, mark) values (#{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
